data.title: CentraHub AUTO
data.meta_description: CentraHub AUTO | CentraHub AUTO is provided by CentraHub, a subsidiary of Focus Softnet. It is the most reliable and trusted CRM and ERP software vendor providing advanced solutions for businesses across the globe. As an easy-to-use automotive CRM software, CentraHub AUTO helps automobile dealers manage vehicle sales, rentals, garages, and workshop facilities from a single platform, with no further need to deploy different applications for various operational needs.
data.text:
